title: Laser-induced fibers and copper phthalocyanine modified laser-induced graphene electrodes for sensitive and selective electrochemical detection of nitrite
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28648-28658
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03341H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Anurag Adiraju, Aditya Jalasutram, Ammar Al-Hamry, Malak Talbi, Junfei Wang, Christoph Tegenkamp, Olfa Kanoun
This work demonstrates the potential of laser-induced fibers as functionalization material for electrochemical sensors and implements copper phthalocyanine and laser-induced fibers modified laser-induced graphene electrodes to detect nitrite.
